column3: News;Koh Kong Province: The Police Inspectorate of Koh Kong District said that at 9:30 am on January 6
column5: they received information from the armed forces (Brigade 48?) that a skeleton had been discovered inÂ Pang Koh Rong commune.------After receiving the above information
column6: the district Police Inspectorate along with relevant authorities went down to the scene of the incident.------According to police
